mapper.select: SELECT ENTER_CD FROM TSYS955 WHERE STD_CD_VALUE = #{tenantId} AND STD_CD ='WTM_TENANT_ID'
SELECT ENTER_CD, GRCODE_CD, CODE, CODE_NM, SYMD, EYMD, SEQ, NOTE FROM V_IF_WTM_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD, GRCODE_CD
SELECT ENTER_CD, LOCATION_CD, YMD, HOLIDAY_NM, FESTIVE_YN, PAY_YN FROM V_IF_WTM_HOLIDAY WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD

SELECT ENTER_CD, GNT_CD, GNT_NM, GNT_GUBUN_CD, HOL_INCL_YN, REQUEST_USE_TYPE, WORK_YN, PAY_YN, NOTE FROM V_IF_TAA_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD
SELECT ENTER_CD, ORG_CD, ORG_NM, SYMD, EYMD, ORG_TYPE, NOTE FROM V_IF_ORG_CODE WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD
SELECT DISTINCT ENTER_CD, ORG_CHART_NM, SYMD, EYMD, NOTE FROM V_IF_ORG_CHART WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY SYMD

SELECT ENTER_CD, SABUN, EMP_NM, EMP_ENG_NM, SYMD, EYMD, STATUS_CD, ORG_CD, LOCATION_CD , DUTY_CD, POS_CD, CLASS_CD, JOB_GROUP_CD, JOB_CD, PAY_TYPE_CD, LEADER_YN FROM V_IF_WTM_EMPHIS WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD, SABUN, SYMD
SELECT ENTER_CD, ORG_CD, SABUN, SYMD, EYMD FROM V_IF_WTM_ORG_CONC WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
SELECT ENTER_CD, SABUN, EMAIL, HAND_PHONE, NOTE FROM V_IF_EMP_ADDR WHERE ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ORDER BY ENTER_CD

SELECT A.ENTER_CD , B.SABUN , B.GNT_CD , B.S_YMD , B.E_YMD , B.REQ_S_HM , B.REQ_E_HM , A.APPL_SEQ , CASE WHEN NVL(B.UPDATE_YN, 'N') = 'Y' THEN '44' WHEN A.APPL_STATUS_CD = 'ZZ' THEN '44' ELSE A.APPL_STATUS_CD END AS APPL_STATUS_CD FROM THRI103 A INNER JOIN TTIM301 B ON A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.APPL_SEQ = B.APPL_SEQ WHERE A.ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND A.APPL_CD = '22' AND A.APPL_STATUS_CD <> '11' AND B.CHKDATE > TO_DATE(#{lastDataTime}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TTIM511(ENTER_CD, YY, SABUN, GNT_CD, USE_S_YMD, USE_E_YMD, CRE_CNT, USE_CNT, REST_CNT, COM_CNT, CHKDATE, CHKID) VALUES (#{enterCd}, SUBSTR(#{symd}, 1, 4), #{sabun}, #{gntCd}, #{symd}, #{eymd}, ${compCnt}, ${compCnt}, ${compCnt}, ${compCnt}, SYSDATE, 'MIG')
